title: Chat with Araya tile missing/broken link
description: The Chat with Araya tile was linking to the wrong page (araya-chat.html instead of workspace-v3.html)
fix_description: Updated openAraya() function in workspace.html to link to workspace-v3.html. The 'Chat with Araya' tile on the 100x workspace page now correctly redirects users to the Araya chat interface.
